Hi Fuguo,

some days ago I nearly went crazy with a bug in my software, whi=
ch only
occured in some JUnit-tests. After spending lots of time it turned =
out to be
caused by iterating over a HashSet. I wrongly thought the order d=
oesn't
matter I used the HashSet. Additionally I didn't override the
hashCo=
de()-functions. This causes my program to iterate sometimes (usually
when I=
 run as JUnit-test but quite never when I run with a debugger and
breakpoin=
ts - I guess it has something to do with the hashcodes depending on
the all=
ocated memory) in another order.
So the assumption that the order of iterat=
ion doesn't matter was wrong and
this causes the failure.

Possibly it's so=
mehow similar to your problem...
